about.details:
Incorporated in 2016, Poojawestern Metaliks Ltd is engaged in manufacturing of Brass and Brass Equipments to cater to the international markets. Company's product range includes brass billets, ingots, brass bars, brass and chrome plumbing fittings, brass inserts and adapters for CPVC and PPR pipes etc are sold under the brand name of "P-". They are a well known brand in Arab and Gulf market for brass products.

They mainly export brass products to Arab and Gulf countries. They use brass scrap as raw material which is imported from United Kingdom, United States of America and Gulf Countries for conversion of scrap into finished goods.

contactDetails.full_address: Poojawestern Metaliks Ltd, Plot No.1 Phase II, GIDC Dared, Jamnagar - 361004

faqs.question: What is the Poojawestern Metaliks IPO?
faqs.answer:
Poojawestern Metaliks IPO is a SME IPO of 1521000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹5.48 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹36 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on September 22, 2017, and closes on September 26, 2017.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Poojawestern Metaliks IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Poojawestern Metaliks IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Poojawestern Metaliks IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Poojawestern Metaliks IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Poojawestern Metaliks IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Poojawestern Metaliks IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Poojawestern Metaliks IPO opens on September 22, 2017 and closes on September 26, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Poojawestern Metaliks IPO?
faqs.answer: Poojawestern Metaliks IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,08,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Poojawestern Metaliks IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Poojawestern Metaliks IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
